bibl.title: Private Letter.
bibl.note: The letter reports about the coming release (from prison?) of a herdsman. Provenance unknown, AD 27.vii.29.

bibl.title: Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno.

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Leid. Rijksmus. van Oudheden Inv. 1971/2.2 = P. Pintaudi 52
Diletta Minutoli (a cura di), Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno (P.Pintaudi) (Firenze, 2012) pp. 229-232 et pl. XLIX.
The letter reports about the coming release (from prison?) of a herdsman. Provenance unknown, AD 27.vii.29.
